summary: A group of female friends get together with some hired "ladies of the evening", and make some quick cash for throwing a raunchy party for the local hockey team.
cast: Kathy Bain|Ken James|Taborah Johnson|Jérôme Tiberghien|Martin Neufeld|Wendy Lands|Hrant Alianak|Chantale Perron|Judy Foster|Mark Walker|Jeff Braunstein|Helene Udy|Geoffrey MacKay|Lenore Zann
title: One Night Only
